meanings.definition: ambeers (noun): plural form of ambeer, a type of alcoholic beverage
meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone enjoyed the refreshing ambeers.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a variety of ambeers to the customers.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was a success thanks to the delicious ambeers.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the ambeers filled the room, enticing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The brewery tour ended with a tasting of different ambeers.

meanings.definition: ambeers (verb): third person singular present of ambeer, to drink or consume ambeer
meanings.sent1: He always ambeers his favorite drink after work.
meanings.sent2: She ambeers slowly, savoring every sip of the beverage.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to ambeers its milk in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The river ambeers the rainwater, flowing steadily downstream.
meanings.sent5: The children eagerly ambeers the sweet treats at the party.

meanings.definition: ambeers (adjective): describing something related to or characteristic of ambeer
meanings.sent1: The bar had a cozy, ambeers atmosphere that welcomed guests.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace made of ambeers stones that sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent3: The ambeers scent of the brewery lingered in the air.
meanings.sent4: His paintings captured the vibrant, ambeers colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with ambeers artwork celebrating the drink.
